segments.text: I walk into this kitchen and freeze in shock.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the sink, overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with a towel, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming at her feet; how hasn't she noticed?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the kids on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balancing on a stool that's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl has her hand out, expecting one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on the jar, ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is unbelievable; accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
